product_name: REI RFID Credit Card Shield - Package of 3
long_description: Lightweight and compact, the REI RFID Credit Card shield combats potential ID theft by keeping personal information private. It blocks access to personal data stored on credit card micro chips. Tear- and water-resistant laminated foil helps block unauthorized scanning of the RFID (radio frequency identification) chips found inside credit and debit cards. Includes a package of 3 sleeves.
short_description: Lightweight and compact, the REI RFID Credit Card shield combats potential ID theft by keeping personal information private. It blocks access to personal data stored on credit card micro chips.
